title: STAT+: U.K.’s state-owned investment bank shows up in the U.S., eager to spend on biotech
description: The U.K. government wants to boost the local life sciences industry, and it hopes to entice American venture capital firms to help.
content: The U.K. government wants to boost the local life sciences industry, and it hopes to entice American venture capital firms to help.
